00014 #define NIBBLES_PER_INT sizeof(int) * 2
00015 
00016 int fputi(int i, FILE * stream) {
00017         char msg[10];
00018 
00019         memset(msg, '\0', 10);
00020         intToString(i, msg);
00021 
00022         return fputs((const char *)msg, stream);
00023 }
00024 
00025 int fputx(int num, FILE * stream) {
00026         char msg[NIBBLES_PER_INT + 3];
00027         int i, nibbles, mask, c;
00028 
00029         memset(msg, '\0', NIBBLES_PER_INT + 3);
00030         mask = 0x0000000F;
00031         msg[0] = '0';
00032         msg[1] = 'x';
00033         for ( i = 0, nibbles = NIBBLES_PER_INT; i < nibbles; ++i ) {
00034                 c = num & mask;
00035                 if ( c < 0xA )  
00036                         msg[NIBBLES_PER_INT - i + 1] = '0' + c;
00037                 else
00038                         msg[NIBBLES_PER_INT - i + 1] = 'A' + c - 10;
00039                 num = num >> 4;
00040         }
00041         return fputs((const char *)msg, stream);
00042 }

00044 int fputc ( int c, FILE * stream )
00045 {
00046         if ( stream == NULL  )
00047                 return EOF;
00048         if ( fwrite(stream, &c, 1) != 1 )
00049                 return EOF;
00050         return c;
00051 }

00053 int fgetc ( FILE * stream )
00054 {
00055         int c;
00056         
00057         if ( stream == NULL )
00058                 return EOF;
00059         if(fread(stream, &c, 1) != 1 ){
00060                 return EOF;
00061         }
00062                 
00063         return c;
00064 }

00066 int fputs ( const char * s, FILE * stream )
00067 {
00068         int ret;
00069 
00070         if ( s == NULL || stream == NULL )
00071                 return EOF;
00072         if ( (ret = fwrite(stream, (char *)s, strlen(s))) == EOF )
00073                 return EOF;
00074         return ret;
00075 }
00076 
00077 char * fgets ( char * s, int size, FILE * stream )
00078 {
00079         if ( stream == NULL || s == NULL || size <= 0 )
00080                 return NULL;
00081         if ( fread(stream, s, size) == EOF )
00082                 return NULL;
00083         return s;
00084 }

00086 void flush ( FILE * stream )
00087 {
00088         if ( stream == NULL )
00089                 return;
00090         stream->ptr = stream->buffer;
00091 }
